about_the_game:
Lamplight is a mind-bending 3D puzzle platformer that will challenge your sense of reality. Defy gravity and bend time as you navigate a labyrinthine world where walls become floors, ceilings transform into pathways, and the very fabric of space warps to your will.

Master the Unstable:

  • Physics Gone Wild: Think outside the box (or the room, rather) as you manipulate gravity and experiment with the environment to solve ingenious puzzles.
  • Elusive Gameplay: Navigate a world where time itself becomes a tool. Unwind past actions, manipulate the present, and unlock the secrets hidden within this distorted reality.

A World of Mystery:
Unravel the Enigma: Lamplight's hauntingly beautiful environments hold hidden clues and secrets waiting to be discovered. Explore, experiment, and piece together the narrative woven throughout this surreal world.
Embrace the Challenge: Can you master the warped physics and temporal paradoxes? Lamplight will test your wit, creativity, and ability to think laterally.

Are you ready to step into a world where up is down, time is fluid, and the only limit is your imagination? Enter Lamplight and see the impossible become reality.
